ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), or(text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", text( SBU__c ) = "ATR"), Is_Follow_On_Opportunity__c == false, RecordTypeId <> '0121B000001RY8u', Parent_Opportunity__c <> null )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No Parent Opportunity allowed if the opportunity is not a Follow On Opportunity.
